commit message:
Clean up irritating code.

All network definitions around use `setRegion(region)`, but this
one not. This is irritating.

Add logo for Münchner Verkehrs- und Tarifverbund (MVV), Germany.

Logo is based on
https://de.wikipedia.org/wiki/Datei:M%C3%BCnchner_Verkehrs-_und_Tarifverbund.svg

Licensed via Wikipedia.

Add logo for Ingolstädter Verkehrsgesellschaft (INVG), Germany.

Logo is based on
https://de.wikipedia.org/wiki/Datei:Ingolst%C3%A4dter_Verkehrsgesellschaft_Logo.svg

Licensed via Wikipedia.

Add logo for Verkehrsverbund Mittelschwaben (VVM), Germany.

Logo is based on
https://de.wikipedia.org/wiki/Datei:VVM_Logo.svg

Licensed via Wikipedia.

Merge pull request #155 from htgoebel/master

Add logos for MVV, INVG, VVM in Germany.
Click on departure now searches for this trip

Introduce gradle-witness for dependencies, build OSMBonusPack from jcenter

and bump versions
allow logging of location auto-completion results
make travis happy by bumping build-tools version and adding tools
Allow to also show trips on map
show changelog again in dark, if dark theme is enabled
add map button that shows all objects

turn off hardware rendering for map view

to work around vanishing trip line.
Upstream Issue: MKergall/osmbonuspack#168

Show info window when long pressing the map and provide options

Also rename some variables in the MapActivity
Show map info window properly with dark themes and support new PTE location type
fix problem with color changing toolbar icons once and for all
do not show dialog for home location in full screen

Make Travis happy by using dex options and gradle wrapper

Also enable Instant Run
Clean up code related to location input views

Major improvements when auto-completing entered locations

such as filtering locally before loading faster and better from internet

Closes #79
update translations
update PTE and don't crash when HSL returns locations without name
add Map selector to location drop down list
update translations again
release version 1.0.5
